string.value: You perform a favor for #Robby Fray#k so he would agree to cater the party, but when you go to turn it in, he screams in dismay. It seems like you'll have to do him another favor...

Uh oh. Without his Secret Recipe, Robby Fray can't bear to keep living, let alone cater a party. Hopefully you can find his Secret Recipe before somebody else nabs it.\r\nIt should be with the Doll Claw Games on the 3rd-4th floor of the Shopping Center, right?\r\n
Whew! Finally, you convinced Robby Fray, the seven star chef, to cater the party. Report the good news to #bLana#k.
Oh no! If this secret is leaked... I can't even bear to think of it. Hey, you there! Don't just stand there, I need your help!

I lost the #bSecret Recipe#k that contains how to make all my most precious delicacies! I just KNOW I lost it while trying to win a stuffed pink elephant in one of those silly claw machines on the 3rd-4th floor of Kerning Square. Ugh, I got so carried away... I think I just LEFT it there. Oh, oh, oh! I'm going to cry!
If I don't find my Secret Recipe, there is no way I can continue living, let alone cater #bBlake#k's party...
Oh, please tell me you found my Secret Recipe! Please!!

Oh, thank goodness! That's it! Oh, my precious recipe, my baby. Thank you so much. I will take care of Blake's party as promised. Don't worry about a thing. It'll be magnificent. Please let #bLana#k the CEO of Big Hit Records know.
Take the escalator to the 3rd-4th floor of the Shopping Center. When you get there, defeat the Dolls and bring me back my precious #b#t4032508##k! I beg you!
